Past Web Projects

2010 — 2012
Andrew Jiang

My past projects are a little embarrasing, but I'd like to show you them anyway—for the nostalgia. These are projects that I made when I first began designing and trying to learn CSS, HTML, PHP and MySQL. I hope you enjoy looking through my old collection of projects— just don't confuse these with my current abilities!
